siyalu minissu miya yannomaya.eheth maranaya ehi wadagathkamin wiwidha wiya haka."maranaya siyalu minisun kara eka lesama elambaena namuth eya thayi parwathayata wada bara ho pihatuwakata wada sahallu wiya haka"yi parani china lekhakayek wu ssuma wiyan kiweya.janathawa udesa miyayama thayi parwathayata wada baraya.fasistwadin wenuwen wadakirimath surakannan ha pidakayan wenuwen miya yamath pihatuwakata wada sahalluya
